bibl.title: Texts from the Spurlock Collection.
bibl.note: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, Spurlock Museum of World Cultures. - 1. Inv. 1913.03.0017. Memorandum (ostracon), I-II A.D. Found in Abydos, acquired in 1913. - 2. Inv. 1911.02.0057. Unidentified text on wood, II-III A.D. Given by the Egypt Exploration Society in 1911.
